adHeader: Professional Web Design - Call Greg 745-0318 (415 area code)
adDetails: My name is Greg. I design professional websites for small companies and start ups. Please contact me via my website. Please call. I am open to texts. Visit my website - www.gregswebdesign.net - for design examples. My primary focus is on following: ✓ Professional website re-design. ✓ New website design. ✓ Shopping cart and Online store installation (E-commerce). ✓ Help you upload your product image and descriptions for each item. ✓ Create a presence for your small business. ✓ Update your Wordpress site with things beyond basic layout changes. ✓ Help you create an e-commerce store and add your products. I also provide web hosting, if needed. Web Design by Greg: Please text or call show contact info for immediate assistance. There is more information on my website gregswebdesign.net. Craig's list doesn't let me create URL's -- please copy and paste it into your browser. Thanks, Greg
